SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwMSDilbornScript

begin ondeath
	if GetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookA == 110
		return
	endif
	fbmwAlamREF.StartCombat Player
	fbmwMelurREF.StartCombat Player
end

begin gamemode
	if GetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookA == 110 || GetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookB >= 1
		return
	endif

	if GetDisabled == 1
		Return
	endif

	if ( GetDeadCount 0drathasSnerus == 1 )
		if ( GetDeadCount 0melurSsavil == 1 )
			if ( GetDeadCount 0alamSmerys == 1 )
				if ( fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control < 2 )
					set fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control to 2
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control == 2 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookA < 1 )
			if GetDead == 0
				SetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookB 1
				fbmwThrudREF.Disable
				Stopcombat
				StartQuest fbmwMSBarbarianBookA
				set fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control to 3
				return
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control == 2 )
		if ( GetDeadCount 0thrud == 1 )
			if ( GetDeadCount 0Dilborn == 0 )
				SetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookA 140
				set fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control to 3
			endif
		endif

		if ( GetDeadCount 0thrud == 0 )
			if ( GetDeadCount 0Dilborn == 1 )
				SetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookA 150
				set fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control to 3
			endif
		endif

		if ( GetDeadCount 0thrud == 0 )
			if ( GetDeadCount 0Dilborn == 0 )
				SetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookA 160
				set fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control to 3
			endif
		endif

		if ( GetDeadCount 0thrud == 1 )
			if ( GetDeadCount 0Dilborn == 1 )
				SetStage fbmwMSBarbarianBookC 1
				set fbmwMSBarbarianBookA.control to 3
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 802 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
